/node_modules
/.pnp
.pnp.js

# Testing
/coverage

# Production
/build

# Misc
.DS_Store
.env
.env.local
.env.development.local
.env.test.local
.env.production.local

.pnpm-debug.log*

# Editor directories and files
.idea
.vscode
*.swp
*.swo
*~

# OS generated files
Thumbs.db

# Optional npm cache directory
.npm

# Optional eslint cache
.eslintcache

# Optional stylelint cache
.stylelintcache

# Optional REPL history
.node_repl_history

# Output of 'npm pack'
*.tgz

# Yarn Integrity file
.yarn-integrity

# dotenv environment variable files
.env.development
.env.test
.env.production

# PWA files
**/public/sw.js
**/public/workbox-*.js
**/public/service-worker.js

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.temp

# Lock files (uncomment if you don't want to commit lock files)
# package-lock.json
# yarn.lock
# pnpm-lock.yaml
